## Create a vector

```{r}
set.seed(42) ##ensures same random numbers selected
my_unif <- runif(30)
is.vector(my_unif) ## = True
```

```{r}
my_unif[1:10]
my_unif[c(1:3, 15:17)]
```

Sort the vector

```{r}
sort(my_unif)
```

Create a vector with strings in it

```{r}
char_vec <- c('daf', 'Adf', '12h', 'h3')
sort(char_vec) #numbers, then uppercase, then lowercase
```
